title: Okay. 2 Google phones, one which kept losing network and hardware and my Pixel. Who hacked my bank?
content:
Why are they all pixels? I clearly said who did some social engineering on my bank? Not account. My bank. Why did I get murdered twice and die twenty some odd times with every fucking phone having a Google follow up in it? And God damnit, I proved fifteen of twenty seven proven years of stalking case without a pixel . Where the fuck is my screen shot god dammit.

Got a pixel four. Love the phone. Someone with money hacked the shit out of these. Who hacked Regions?
